body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather              Weather          Temperatures range from >100°F (38°C) to <20°F (-7°C). Summer days can be hot and humid, while wind chill can make winter temperatures feel much colder. Your visit can be more enjoyable by checking the forecast and coming prepared for hiking with in the park or shopping long Bathhouse Row. "Know before you go!"
